testprocedure.test-case-summary: This test procedure is called by a test case and is used to verify the SUTs support of the dlOrganizationInformationSubscription dialog as an EC using variables provided by the calling test case. This procedure supports verification of requirements related to user need 2.3.2 [Need to Provide Information on Organizations, Centers, and Contacts] and is used for both valid and invalid test cases.

testStep.functionId: Step 1 CONFIGURE: Determine the Application Layer Standard that will be used for this test. RECORD this information as: ApplicationLayerStandard: ${ApplicationLayerStandard}

Step 2 CONFIGURE: Determine the dialog performance requirement for Publish Organization Information (NTRM 3.3.2.2}. RECORD this value as: TMDD_N4R17_Publish_Organization_Information_Parameter = ${TMDD_N4R17_Publish_Organization_Information_Parameter}

Step 3 CONFIGURE: Determine the dialog performance requirement for Subscribe to Organization Information (NTRM 3.3.2.3}. RECORD this value as: TMDD_N4R18_Subscribe_to_Organization_Information_Parameter = ${TMDD_N4R18_Subscribe_to_Organization_Information_Parameter}

Step 4 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Authentication - Organization Information (AuthOrg) is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.2.4.2.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N4R21_Authentication___Organization_Information__AuthOrg__Supported = ${TMDD_N4R21_Authentication___Organization_Information__AuthOrg__Supported}

Step 5 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Operator Identifier - Organization Information is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.2.4.2.1.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N4R22_Operator_Identifier___Organization_Information_Supported = ${TMDD_N4R22_Operator_Identifier___Organization_Information_Supported}

Step 6 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Owner Organization Identifier is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.2.4.2.2). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N4R23_Owner_Organization_Identifier_Supported = ${TMDD_N4R23_Owner_Organization_Identifier_Supported}

Step 7 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Owner Center Identifier is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.2.4.2.3). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N4R24_Owner_Center_Identifier_Supported = ${TMDD_N4R24_Owner_Center_Identifier_Supported}

Step 8 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Restrictions - Error Report is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.1.4.1.2.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N4R15_Restrictions___Error_Report_Supported = ${TMDD_N4R15_Restrictions___Error_Report_Supported}
Step 9 CONFIGURE: Define the publication message that will be sent to the SUT. RECORD this information as: PublicationMessage: ${PublicationMessage}
Step 10 CONFIGURE: Determine the number of publication message transmissions that will be performed within this test. RECORD this information as: PublicationCount: ${PublicationCount}
Step 11 CONFIGURE: Determine whether an error response message is expected for this test. RECORD this information as: PublicationErrorResponseExpected: ${PublicationErrorResponseExpected}

Step 12 CONFIGURE: IF PublicationErrorResponseExpected is true, determine the expected error code response for this test. RECORD this information as: PublicationErrorTypeExpected: ${PublicationErrorTypeExpected}
Step 13 CONFIGURE: Determine whether the Authentication parameters need to be verified within this test. RECORD this information as: AuthenticationCheck: ${AuthenticationCheck}
Step 14 CONFIGURE: Identify the Username expected for authentication during this test. RECORD this information as: Username: ${Username}
Step 15 CONFIGURE: Identify the Password expected for authentication during this test. RECORD this information as: Password: ${Password}
Step 16 CONFIGURE: Identify the Operator Identifier expected for authentication during this test. RECORD this information as: OperatorID: ${OperatorID}
Step 17 CONFIGURE: Determine whether the SUT will be allowed access to the information requested in this test. RECORD this information as: AllowAccess: ${AllowAccess}
Step 18 CONFIGURE: Determine whether an error response message is expected for this test. RECORD this information as: SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected: ${SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected}

Step 19 CONFIGURE: IF SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected is true, determine the expected error code response for this test. RECORD this information as: SubscriptionErrorTypeExpected: ${SubscriptionErrorTypeExpected}
Step 20 CONFIGURE: Define the subscription response message that will be sent to the SUT. RECORD this information as: SubscriptionResponseMessage: ${SubscriptionResponseMessage}

Step 21 SUBSCRIPTION-OC-RECEIVE with the following parameters: DIALOG=dlOrganizationInformationSubscription RESPONSETIMEREQUIRED= AUTHENTICATIONCHECK = AuthenticationCheck USERNAME = Username PASSWORD = Password OPERATORID = OperatorID ALLOWACCESS = AllowAccess SUBSCRIPTIONERRORRESPONSEEXPECTED = SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected SUBSCRIPTIONERRORTYPEEXPECTED = SubscriptionErrorTypeExpected Returns: CONTINUEPUBLICATION

Step 22 IF SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected is not equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps. Note: If a verification step fails, then test execution will proceed at the next subsequent Post Condition step, if present. Otherwise, test execution will proceed to the final Exit step.
Step 22.1 VERIFY that an organizationInformationRequestMsg message was received.
Step 22.2 VERIFY that an organization-requesting data frame exists within message organizationInformationRequestMsg.
Step 22.3 VERIFY that an organization-information-type data element exists within message organizationInformationRequestMsg.
Step 22.4 IF TMDD_N4R21_Authentication___Organization_Information__AuthOrg__Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 22.4.1 VERIFY that an authentication data frame exists within message organizationInformationRequestMsg.
Step 22.5 IF TMDD_N4R22_Operator_Identifier___Organization_Information_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 22.5.1 VERIFY that an operator-id data element exists within each instance of data frame organizationInformationRequestMsg.authentication
Step 22.6 IF TMDD_N4R23_Owner_Organization_Identifier_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 22.6.1 VERIFY that an organization-id data element exists within message organizationInformationRequestMsg.
Step 22.7 IF TMDD_N4R24_Owner_Center_Identifier_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 22.7.1 VERIFY that a center-id-list data frame exists within message organizationInformationRequestMsg.
Step 22.8 VERIFY that the values within the REQUEST message are correct per the TMDD standard and known operational conditions.

USER-VERIFY-MESSAGE.functionId: The User Verifies the message content

testStep.functionId: Step 22.9 CONFIGURE: Set CONTENTVERIFIED to True

Step 22.10 POSTCONDITION: SUBSCRIPTION-OC-REPLY with the following parameters: DIALOG=dlOrganizationInformationSubscription RESPONSETIMEREQUIRED= CONTENTVERIFIED = CONTENTVERIFIED SUBSCRIPTIONRESPONSEMESSAGE = SubscriptionResponseMessage

Step 22.11 WHILE CONTINUEPUBLICATION is equal to TRUE then CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps. Note:If a verification step fails, then test execution will proceed at the next subsequent Post Condition step, if present. Otherwise, test execution will proceed to the final Exit step.

Step 22.11.1 PUBLICATION-OC with the following parameters: DIALOG=dlOrganizationInformationUpdate RESPONSETIMEREQUIRED=TMDD_N4R17_Publish_Organization_Information_Parameter PUBLICATIONMESSAGE = PublicationMessage PUBLICATIONCOUNT = PublicationCount PUBLICATIONERRORRESPONSEEXPECTED = PublicationErrorResponseExpected PUBLICATIONERRORTYPEEXPECTED = PublicationErrorTypeExpected Returns: CONTINUEPUBLICATION

Step 22.11.2 IF PublicationErrorResponseExpected is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps. If a verification step fails, then test execution will proceed at the next subsequent Post Condition step, if present. Otherwise, test execution will proceed to the final Exit step.
Step 22.11.2.1 VERIFY that an errorReportMsg message was received.
Step 22.11.2.2 VERIFY that an organization-information data frame exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 22.11.2.3 VERIFY that an organization-requesting data frame exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 22.11.2.4 VERIFY that an error-code data element exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 22.11.2.5 VERIFY that an error-text data element exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 22.11.2.6 VERIFY that data element error-code is set to PublicationErrorResponseTypeExpected.
Step 22.11.2.7 IF TMDD_N4R15_Restrictions___Error_Report_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 22.11.2.7.1 VERIFY that a restrictions data frame exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 23 EXIT
